title: ION says Altice shares worth half their current level
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
TEL AVIV, Oct 14 (Reuters) - ION Asset Management laid a case on Wednesday for shorting shares in Patrick Drahi's Altice , which owns Israel...
